title: Actor Nicholas Braun of HBO's Succession
description:
Actor Nicholas Braun joins The Woj Pod to discuss his Golden State Warriors' fandom, the Steph Curry era, his character Greg Hirsch (Cousin Greg) on HBO's hit show Succession, and much, much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
